about_the_game: Evergreen South is a game that allows you to play a survival game based in the real world. Fight bears, clear forests, and build homes! Construct towers and tree houses, or build with your imagination, building endless things. Explore the limitless planet, survive on an island, and play with friends! This is a multiplayer game involving friends, build local or online servers with family and friends. Try to attempt to keep track of the days while you play alone. Build factories to produce your goods for you or fortify your home to keep out the grizzly bears. Discover the endless mysteries, tame animals, and more!
